title: Islamic State Militants Add To Fears Syrians Face From Assad Regime
teaser: Kelly McEvers talks to Syrian journalist Zaina Erhaim, who's in the besieged city of Aleppo, about the state of the conflict in Syria. Erhaim is with the Syrian Institute for War and Peace Reporting.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
